name: SMART-on-FHIR-exercise
description: Using Cerner’s open sandbox at http://fhir.cerner.com/millennium/dstu2/#open-sandbox - create a web application that: * reads and displays a given patient’s demographic data (name, gender, date of birth) * displays a sortable table of active conditions that the patient currently has, including   * condition name   * date first recorded, if available   * link to search for this condition on PubMed (URL takes format `https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/?term=[condition name]` )
